info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued March 06 at 2:57AM CST until March 07 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST this morning through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the most experienced swimmers away from shore into deeper water. These rip currents can become life-threatening to anyone entering the surf.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
